title: Is this just me?
body:
Right now, I have the feeling that Riot is out of touch with their skins. Honestly, I like most of them. But.

Dianna didn't need a new skin, Vlad does. Seriously Riot, you have such a massive collection of champions with almost no skins, and Dianna gets a new skin, again. The same feeling came when you released the Project: Vayne, and Jhin. They are not bad, but I'm just thinking, "Why Vayne? She already has a massive skin collection, and why Jhin, again." 

I know that I say this a lot, but where is Quinn's skin? Concepts everywhere, not even one was picked up. It's not just Quinn, but I think, Quinn needs a new beautiful skin. It has been 5 to 6 years now, and more people are playing her. So if it's for the money, this might be a good time. But I don't know, that's up to you. I  think that you're wasting good ideas for Quinn skins.

Teemo didn't need a skin, but it's so cute I can't say it's not ok. You win this time.

Riot's skins have improved significantly, and I am not trying to tell you they are doing a bad job. Far from it. However, most of their champion choices annoy the hell out of me. Dianna, Riven, Miss Fortune, Vayne, Jhin, Ezreal (The SG one, I don't know why I hate it.).
I have seen many begging for a Project: Riven skin, and I do like how they took the idea, but change the name to Pulsfire. So I'm not going to complain, it's well designed and all, but I won't buy it. I already have her best skins.

Here are some of my thoughts, and I know some will agree and disagree. But, I really, need this off my chest. Thanks for reading.

Have success in all your games. GL HF <3
